meanings.definition: Send the same message indiscriminately to (a large number of recipients) over the Internet.
meanings.sent1: He kept spamming his friends with the same joke over and over.
meanings.sent2: The company was spamming customers with promotional emails.
meanings.sent3: The robot thought spamming 'hello' to everyone was a good way to make friends.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, spamming joy to all who heard.
meanings.sent5: The rain fell relentlessly, spamming the ground with water.

meanings.definition: Unsolicited electronic messages, typically advertising, sent in bulk.
meanings.sent1: I received so much spamming in my email inbox today.
meanings.sent2: The spamming about weight loss products was annoying.
meanings.sent3: The spamming offering magical potions made me chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were filled with the noise of spamming flyers being handed out.
meanings.sent5: The spamming cluttered her mailbox, making it hard to find important letters.
